name: ISIS Ninja
description:
Are you a moralist who does not appreciate irreverent humor mixed with gratuitous violence? I suggest you go back, this game is not for you! For everyone else, ISIS Ninja is nothing more than an desecrating parody of the famous Fruit Ninja, based on the sad events that are happening in the Middle East ... as they say where I come from, <>

For comments, reports of bugs or informations: scardygames@yahoo.it
